name: tp4-monorepo
description: TP4 monorepo containing web frontend and API backend

scripts.build: bun run build:web && bun run build:api
scripts.test: bun run test:web && bun run test:api
scripts.install:all: bun install && cd web && bun install && cd ../api && bun install
